mapper.select: select vd.name vaccine_name, vsb.vaccine_detail_id, vsb.vaccine_times_id, vsb.status, vsb.scheme_type from v_vaccine_scheme_base vsb LEFT JOIN v_vaccine_detail vd on vd.id=vsb.vaccine_detail_id LEFT JOIN v_vaccine_times vt on vt.id=vsb.vaccine_times_id where vsb.scheme_type=#{schemeType}
